title: Cozy home with natural lighting, 2 bedrooms 1 bath, on a quiet block
description:
A cozy and charming renovated home with 2 bedrooms and 1 bath on a quiet, friendly block in New Bold/Point Breeze. $1,800 per month with 1 year lease. All utilities included and central air. Can be partially furnished. No pets or smoking.
Home features hardwood flooring and natural lighting throughout with modern features. Open floor design with spacious living room and dining room. Fireplace and recessed lights make it feel cozy. The kitchen is perfect size with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops. The backdoor will take you out to the peaceful patio.
On the second floor are the two bedrooms and one bathroom. Each room has roomy closets with lights and ceiling fans along with a large closet in the hallway. Both bedrooms have cream colored rugs making it comfy.
The lower level is finished and can be used as an extra room or storage. Windows let in plenty of light. Also, the washer and dryer are there.
The home is 4 blocks from the subway (Tasker/Morris), major bus routes, several grocers, and dining is nearby. Parking is off-street with permit required for the block but is easy to find parking with no restrictions around the corner.
Smart home features include programmable thermostat with wi-fi, keypad deadbolt, and home alarm system. Owner takes great care of home and expects the same from you. $1,000 security deposit to cover any fees caused from inattention to items in lease and last month rent required.
Serious inquiries please. Send a message with an intro about you. Messages without an intro will not be considered.

title: Beautiful 4-BR with Backyard
description:
Beautiful 4 bedrooms and 2 full baths. Constructed in 2010, it features a modern kitchen with updated appliances and granite counter tops, hardwood floors, spacious bedrooms and bathrooms, washer/dryer and security system.  There is a large full basement and great outdoor space in the fenced backyard. It takes up the first floor and half the second floor of the building.
With a large living space, basement and back yard, this apartment is perfect for entertaining guests!
Located in the Temple U area, it is a busy area, with a lot of foot traffic. Safety considerations include a security system. The local police station is nearby at 1747 N 17th Street (22nd District), and Temple U police also patrol the street. Because of the large number of students and recent grads in the area, it is a noisy area. The people upstairs are students.  It is a nice safe and social area, so very attractive in that regard, but not appropriate for people seeking a quiet, sedate setting.
There is easy access to buses and the Broad Street Line, walking distance to the Liacouras Center, The Met, supermarkets, restaurants and other amenities.
Owner pays water. Tenant(s) pay electricity, cable and internet. Pet friendly, allowing one cat or small dog, with additional non-refundable pet deposit of $300.
The lease can begin August 15 to September 1, and will run through July 31, 2023. An application is required, but there is no charge. You must provide SSN and consent to a background check.  We also need 2 recent pay stubs, and a W-2 or 1099 from 2021. If you are younger and do not have this, we may need a parent or guardian to co-sign.

title: This is an amazing home located on a quiet block
description:
This is an amazing home located on a quiet block in the heart of Northern Liberties, just around the corner from the Piazza and Liberties Walk, and steps away from dozens of neighborhood restaurants including Apricot Stone, El Camino Real, Hikari Sushi and Urban Village Brewing Company. Upon entering you will notice the open and inviting floor plan. The first floor has hardwood flooring, high ceilings , a bathroom, a gas fireplace, and a piano. Light pours through the kitchen from the backyard through a glass door that leads to an outdoor city oasis, including a patio AND grass! The basement has a custom bar and pool table for entertaining. Venturing upstairs to the 2nd floor, you will find a cozy back bedroom and large front bedroom with a renovated bathroom, a front-loading washer and dryer, and large walk-in closet. The 3rd floor features a large home office that could double as an extra bedroom. French doors open into the primary bedroom, which boasts large closet space, hardwood flooring, and a fully renovated bath with dual shower heads. The home is full of character, with custom built-ins and solid wood doors, and has been featured in Design Home, Nest, Apartment Therapy, and Philadelphia Magazine. The home has a nest thermostat and ADT security set up. There is permit parking on the block, neighborhood favorite One Shot Cafe on the corner, and both Heirloom Market and Acme only a block away!

title: Right in the heart of Center City Philadelphia
description:
Right in the heart of Center City Philadelphia, you will find this furnished GEM! This cozy, fresh and fly furnished apartment has everything you could possibly need - all you need is a suitcase and some groceries!!! On the first floor you'll find the cozy comforts of home with tastefully done artwork and touches all throughout. All the appliances are sized to be used and enjoyed (read: no dorm room sized refrigerator, for instance) and although a laundromat is a couple blocks away, you won't need to round up quarters because the dual washer/dryer will handle that! The first floor also boosts a little outside nook for when you need to get air without sitting on a stoop and to grow your fresh herbs or whatever you prefer! A snazzy spiral staircase takes you up to the second floor where your queen sized bed, flat screen TV and nicely updated bathroom await you. Don't want to take the spiral route? For those long days when you just need to crash, you can bypass that and take the staircase in the foyer right to your second floor door. It could not be more convenient! As for the location? Groceries, restaurants, entertainment, transportation.... just EVERYTHING is right outside the door! Here you can have the best of both worlds; a beautiful, cozy, quiet furnished home on the inside and a city rich in culture and diversity with convenience galore on the outside. Win, win!

Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 11th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The renovated kitchen is fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., L'Occitane, Boyds, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Alice Pizza, and Marathon Grill. Sip a coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Elixr, Alchemy, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a scone at Metropolitan Bakery.

title: Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes
description:
Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes in Center City Philadelphia, and you'll be blocks from the center of nightlife in Logan Square and Rittenhouse Square. Unit features modern kitchens, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washers and dryers, breakfast bars, pendant lighting, tile backsplashes, wood plank flooring throughout, walk-in closets. Stunning city and museum views are offered in a variety of floor plans! Mainstreet Market and Caf , featuring gourmet coffee and tea and much more! Fitness center with Technogym equipment, Queenax boxing gym, yoga/spin studio with indoor/outdoor workout space. It boasts Philadelphia's largest pools, an art studio, fitness center with boxing gym, yoga/spin studio, social lounge with demonstration kitchen, gourmet market and cafe, outdoor lounge with fire pit, 24-hour concierge, 24/7 package acceptance, resident shuttle service to Center City and University City and more. Make Whole Foods as your second kitchen conveniently located just 1 block away. Our apartments are within one mile of several institutions of higher education: Drexel University, Temple University, University of Penn, CHOP, Moore college of Arts, Community College of Philadelphia. title: This is an amazing home located on a quiet block
description:
This is an amazing home located on a quiet block in the heart of Northern Liberties, just around the corner from the Piazza and Liberties Walk, and steps away from dozens of neighborhood restaurants including Apricot Stone, El Camino Real, Hikari Sushi and Urban Village Brewing Company. Upon entering you will notice the open and inviting floor plan. The first floor has hardwood flooring, high ceilings , a bathroom, a gas fireplace, and a piano. Light pours through the kitchen from the backyard through a glass door that leads to an outdoor city oasis, including a patio AND grass! The basement has a custom bar and pool table for entertaining. Venturing upstairs to the 2nd floor, you will find a cozy back bedroom and large front bedroom with a renovated bathroom, a front-loading washer and dryer, and large walk-in closet. The 3rd floor features a large home office that could double as an extra bedroom. French doors open into the primary bedroom, which boasts large closet space, hardwood flooring, and a fully renovated bath with dual shower heads. The home is full of character, with custom built-ins and solid wood doors, and has been featured in Design Home, Nest, Apartment Therapy, and Philadelphia Magazine. The home has a nest thermostat and ADT security set up. There is permit parking on the block, neighborhood favorite One Shot Cafe on the corner, and both Heirloom Market and Acme only a block away!

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

description:

Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit

description:
This is an amazing home located on a quiet block in the heart of Northern Liberties, just around the corner from the Piazza and Liberties Walk, and steps away from dozens of neighborhood restaurants including Apricot Stone, El Camino Real, Hikari Sushi and Urban Village Brewing Company. Upon entering you will notice the open and inviting floor plan. The first floor has hardwood flooring, high ceilings , a bathroom, a gas fireplace, and a piano. Light pours through the kitchen from the backyard through a glass door that leads to an outdoor city oasis, including a patio AND grass! The basement has a custom bar and pool table for entertaining. title: Right in the heart of Center City Philadelphia
description:
Right in the heart of Center City Philadelphia, you will find this furnished GEM! This cozy, fresh and fly furnished apartment has everything you could possibly need - all you need is a suitcase and some groceries!!! On the first floor you'll find the cozy comforts of home with tastefully done artwork and touches all throughout. All the appliances are sized to be used and enjoyed (read: no dorm room sized refrigerator, for instance) and although a laundromat is a couple blocks away, you won't need to round up quarters because the dual washer/dryer will handle that! A snazzy spiral staircase takes you up to the second floor where your queen sized bed, flat screen TV and nicely updated bathroom await you. Don't want to take the spiral route? For those long days when you just need to crash, you can bypass that and take the staircase in the foyer right to your second floor door. It could not be more convenient! As for the location?
